parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause various safety-critical systems to malfunction, including lighting, instrumentation, and safety features, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver without essential information.
The failure of the TCU can prevent the vehicle from reporting critical safety information, which can compromise the safety of the vehicle and its occupants.
symptoms: Failure of the Lincoln Way app
inability to connect to the vehicle's communication system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the auto start/stop system can cause the vehicle to die while in drive, which can increase the risk of accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: message displays "AUTO STARTSTOP SHIFT TO P

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission shifting issues can cause the vehicle to jerk, hesitate, or stall, leading to a loss of control, accidents, or rear-end collisions.
symptoms: The transmission revs or hesitates to shift gears
RPMs suddenly increase before speed is reduced.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt mechanism can cause the seat belt to bind or lock in place, potentially leading to injuries or accidents. In some cases, the seat belt pretensioner may explode, causing physical harm to the passenger.
symptoms: The seat belt locks in place
the seat belt does not recoil properly
minor injuries to the chest area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the cruise control system can cause unusual noises from the brakes, which can be distracting and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: The brakes make an odd noise when using the cruise control
similar to the sound of getting up from a leather couch.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the window washer system can reduce visibility while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The window washers have failed multiple times

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the driver seat can cause distractions while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The driver seat makes a loud noise
